[DQC.US.0011.6826] It is expected that MinorityInterest with a value of 1,346,000 reported in the network role http://tecnoglass.com/role/BalanceSheets should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest with the dimension us-gaap:StatementEquityComponentsAxis = us-gaap:NoncontrollingInterestMember and a reported value of 1,345,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://tecnoglass.com/role/StatementsOfShareholdersEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this us-gaap:MinorityInterest fact are:
Period : 2018-03-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals of MinorityInterest : -3 Decimals of StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest : -3 Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1534675/000149315218006503/tgls-20180331.xml 1223

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0011.6828] It is expected that RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit with a value of 27,768,000 reported in the network role http://tecnoglass.com/role/NewAccountingStandardsImplemented-ScheduleOfCondensedBalanceSheetDetails, http://tecnoglass.com/role/BalanceSheets, http://tecnoglass.com/role/NewAccountingStandardsImplementedDetailsNarrative should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest with the dimension us-gaap:StatementEquityComponentsAxis = us-gaap:RetainedEarningsMember and a reported value of 27,769,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://tecnoglass.com/role/StatementsOfShareholdersEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this us-gaap:RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit fact are:
Period : 2018-03-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals of RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit : -3 Decimals of StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest : -3 Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1534675/000149315218006503/tgls-20180331.xml 1229
